Articles.Content:
Is there by any chance a mod that includes parts smaller than 0.625 meters, also, if there is, could you give me a link.

I am not talking about Boxsat, Sounding Rockets, or tweakscale (I do not use it since I have procedural parts/fairings, although a config for compatability is helpful). If you guys can mod something, please create a mod specifically for this. Also, if you have extra time, could you please make an InterOrbital Systems based mod, as well as something to commemorate the N-prize rockets and satellites. In fact, might as well put it all in one!

Thank you,

- Astrofox

Edited January 19, 2015 by Astrofox
More Ideas...
